name: Rider On Highway
description:
Rider On Highway is a bike riding game for moto sports lovers. Rider On Highway is an addictive new game in the genre of endless, unlimited arcade racing. Riding a Bike on busy highway is not easy until unless you are best and confident bike rider. Rider On Highway is equipped with best bike handling controls. Have fun while overtaking the cars, buses and trucks on busy highway. Dominate the busy highway with your fastest motorbike. You can update your motorbike by collecting cash and use this cash to unlock new and improved motorbike. On this busy highway avoiding and over taking the traffic at that very speed in your only chance.
If you think driving on highway is easy, than you should get ready to go and dominate the highway with your fastest motorbike.
So, What are you waiting for? Just download Rider On Highway and ride on your bike to rock the highway.

Game Features:
- 2 Gaming Modes
- Bike Store
- 3 Different camera views (Top view, First Person & Second Person)
- Real time traffic
- Awesome Music
- Great 3D Graphics
- Endless Ride
